level.text: Competitive sealed bidding procedures shall be followed except as follows:
An IFB shall be issued only to those bidders which submitted acceptable technical proposals in step one;
The IFB shall prominently state that a bidder shall comply with the specifications and the bidder’s technical proposal; and
The IFB shall not be publically advertised.
